issue.title: [CF 1640] WoW Crashing when trying to import new string
issue.body:
Hi,

 

I'm trying to install a new profile for TMW, but it constantly crashes the WoW Client when I c/p into the box. 

 

I've tried different profiles, and I've tried reinstalling etc.

 

Can you have a look please?

 

Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user termyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1640 | Raw

comments.body:
Can't do anything about this. Blizzard broke pasting of long strings in BFA. Sorry.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

So there is no way now to put a new TMW profile in? 


> Posted by CurseForge user termyy

Just break the text in parts and paste. 


> Posted by CurseForge user cordankos

Interesting - I never thought of trying that. I'll have to start recommending that - thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
